simplesimmodel module

Simulation Model for a Simple Business Process

This module contains the following functions related to the simulation of a business process:

  • map_activity_to_number(activity), map_number_to_activity(number) - the encoding of the activities of the process

  • execute_case(env, case, process) - the process flow of a case in the process

  • run_process(env, process) - the process flow of the whole process

  • get_ressources(process), get_current_state - functions to get relevant state information about the process and the cases in it

simplesimmodel.execute_case(env, case, process)[source]

A function, which represents the process model with it’s control flow and ressource allocation. A customer places an order at the system and then is redirected to the order takers, where it’s arranged what type of order the customer wants - standard or custom. After that depending on whether the order is standard or custom, respectively a stock or manufacturer is chosen. Afterwards one of three packing options is chosen and executed. Following the packing one of the three delivery services deliver the order. With that the order is completed.

Parameters

envsimpy.Environment

environment for the simulation

caseint

case-id of the case which is being executed

processbusinessprocess.BusinessProcess

the process to which the case belongs

simplesimmodel.get_current_state(process, case)[source]

Returns

available ressouces

events which already happened in the case

int

current event of the case

simplesimmodel.run_process(env, process)[source]

Runs a new process by generating new cases and executing them.

environment for the simulation
